00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: AuthorizeNet.php 208 2009-02-25 16:04:11Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Authorize.Net class.
00005  * 
00006  * Implements the Authorize.Net AIM connection method.
00007  * 
00008  * Test credit card numbers.
00009  * \li 370000000000002      = American Express.
00010  * \li 6011000000000012     = Discover.
00011  * \li 5424000000000015     = MasterCard.
00012  * \li 4007000000027        = Visa.
00013  * \li 4222222222222        = Test account, set amount to desired response reason code.
00014  * 
00015  * The following constants must be defined:
00016  * \li \c BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_LOGIN_ID = Your Authorize.Net API Login ID.
00017  * \li \c BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_TRAN_KEY = Your Authorize.Net Transaction Key.
00018  * \li \c BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_DEFAULT_MODE = The Authorize.Net default mode (set to 'live', 'test', or 'certification').
00019  * \li \c BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5 = Your Authorize.Net MD5 hash, leave blank if your not sure.
00020  * 
00021  * @class       Boo_AuthorizeNet
00022  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00023  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00024  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00025  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00026  * @version     2.0.1
00027  * @required    http://curl.haxx.se/ cURL version 7.15.0 or greater. SSL support must be \b enabled.
00028  * @see         http://ramaboo.com/code/authorizenet/ Advanced Integration Method (AIM) Developer Guide
00029  * @see         http://www.authorize.net/support/aim_guide.pdf
00030  * @see         http://curl.haxx.se/docs/install.html
00031  */
00032

00146     /**
00147      * @brief Loads default values.
00148      * @return void.
00149      */
00150     public function __construct() {
00151         // defaults
00152         $this->fields = array(
00153             'x_login' => BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_LOGIN_ID,
00154             'x_version' => '3.1',
00155             'x_delim_char' => '|',
00156             'x_encap_char' => '"',
00157             'x_delim_data' => 'TRUE',
00158             'x_type' => 'AUTH_CAPTURE', // AUTH_CAPTURE, AUTH_ONLY, CAPTURE_ONLY, CREDIT, VOID, PRIOR_AUTH_CAPTURE
00159             'x_method' => 'CC',
00160             'x_tran_key' => BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_TRAN_KEY,
00161             'x_relay_response' => 'FALSE');
00162         
00163         $this->setMode(BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_DEFAULT_MODE);
00164     }

00187     /**
00188      * @breif Sets the mode.
00189      * 
00190      * Posible values are:
00191      * \li live = For production use.
00192      * \li test = Test mode.
00193      * \li certification = Certification mode.
00194      * 
00195      * @param string $mode The mode. 
00196      * @return bool Returns TURE if mode was set, FALSE otherwise.
00197      * @warning Test mode and certification mode can cause problems try Boo_AuthorizeNet::testRequest()
00198      * if you recieve error 13.
00199      * 
00200      */
00201     public function setMode($mode) {
00202         $mode = trim(strtolower($mode));
00203         switch ($mode) {
00204             case 'test':
00205                 $this->url = 'https://test.authorize.net/gateway/transact.dll';
00206                 break;
00207             case 'live':
00208                 $this->url = 'https://secure.authorize.net/gateway/transact.dll';
00209                 break;
00210             case 'certification':
00211                 $this->url = 'https://certification.authorize.net/gateway/transact.dll';
00212                 break;
00213             default:
00214                 trigger_error("Mode {$mode} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00215                 return false;
00216         }
00217         $this->mode = $mode;
00218         return true;
00219     }
00220     
00221     /**
00222      * @brief Gets the current mode.
00223      * @return string The mode.
00224      */
00225     public function getMode() { return $this->mode; }

00228      * @brief Gets the current URL.

00230      */
00231     public function getUrl() { return $this->url; }
00232     
00233     /**
00234      * @brief Gets the MD5 hash.
00235      * @return string The MD5 hash.
00236      */
00237     public function getMd5Hash() { return $this->md5Hash; }
00238     
00239     /**
00240      * Checks the gateway MD5 response to make sure that it is correct.
00241      * 
00242      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00243      */
00244     public function checkMd5 () {
00245         if (!$this->md5Hash) {
00246             trigger_error('MD5 hash can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00247             return false;
00248         }
00249         
00250         if (!BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5) {
00251             trigger_error('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5 can not be false', E_USER_ERROR);
00252             return false;
00253         }
00254         
00255         if (!$this->transactionId) {
00256             trigger_error('Transaction ID can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00257             return false;
00258         }
00259         
00260         $amount = $this->getField('x_amount');
00261         if (!$amount) {
00262             trigger_error('Amount can not be false', E_USER_WARNING);
00263             return false;
00264         }
00265         
00266         $result = strtoupper(md5(BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5 . BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_LOGIN_ID . $this->transactionId . $amount));
00267         return $result == $this->md5Hash;
00268     }
00269     
00270     
00271     /**
00272      * @brief The gateway response.
00273      * @return string The gateway response.
00274      */
00275     public function getResponse() { return $this->response; }
00276     
00277     /**
00278      * @brief Indicates the result of the transaction.
00279      * 
00280      * Posible values are:
00281      * \li 0 = Response code is not yet set.
00282      * \li 1 = This transaction has been approved.
00283      * \li 2 = This transaction has been declined.
00284      * \li 3 = There has been an error processing this transaction.
00285      * \li 4 = This transaction is being held for review.
00286      * 
00287      * @return int The response code.
00288      */
00289     public function getResponseCode() { return (int) $this->responseCode; }
00290     
00291     /**
00292      * @brief Returns the word associated with the response code.
00293      * 
00294      * Possible return values are:
00295      * \li unset
00296      * \li approved
00297      * \li declined
00298      * \li error
00299      * \li held
00300      * 
00301      * @return string The word associated with the response code (lowercase), FALSE on failure.
00302      */
00303     public function getResponseCodeWord() {
00304         $code = $this->getResponseCode();
00305         switch ($code) {
00306             case 0:
00307                 $word = 'unset';
00308                 break;
00309             case 1:
00310                 $word = 'approved';
00311                 break;
00312             case 2:
00313                 $word = 'declined';
00314                 break;
00315             case 3:
00316                 $word = 'error';
00317                 break;
00318             case 4:
00319                 $word = 'held';
00320                 break;
00321             default:
00322                 trigger_error("Response code {$code} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00323                 return false;
00324         }
00325         
00326         return $word;
00327     }
00328     
00329     /**
00330      * @brief Determins if transaction is approved.
00331      * @return bool Returns TRUE if approved, FALSE otherwise.
00332      */
00333     public function isApproved() { return $this->responseCode == 1; }
00334     
00335     /**
00336      * @brief Determins if transaction is declined.
00337      * @return bool Returns TURE if declined, FALSE otherwise.
00338      */
00339     public function isDeclined() { return $this->responseCode == 2; }
00340     
00341     /**
00342      * @brief Determins if transaction caused an error.
00343      * @return bool Returns TRUE if error, FALSE otherwise.
00344      */
00345     public function isError() { return $this->responseCode == 3; }
00346     
00347     /**
00348      * @brief Determins if transaction is being held for review.
00349      * @return bool Returns TRUE if transaction is on hold, FALSE otherwise.
00350      */
00351     public function isHold() { return $this->responseCode == 4; }

00377     /**
00378      * @brief Indicates the result of AVS.
00379      * 
00380      * Posible values are:
00381      * \li A = Address (Street) matches, ZIP does not.
00382      * \li B = Address information not provided for AVS check.
00383      * \li E = AVS error.
00384      * \li G = Non-U.S. Card Issuing Bank.
00385      * \li N = No Match on Address (Street) or ZIP.
00386      * \li P = AVS not applicable for this transaction.
00387      * \li R = Retry - System unavailable or timed out.
00388      * \li S = Service not supported by issuer.
00389      * \li U = Address information is unavailable.
00390      * \li W = 9 digit ZIP matches, Address (Street) does not.
00391      * \li X = Address (Street) and 9 digit ZIP match.
00392      * \li Y = Address (Street) and 5 digit ZIP match.
00393      * \li Z = 5 digit ZIP matches, Address (Street) does not.
00394      * 
00395      * @return string AVS result code.
00396      */
00397     public function getAvsResultCode() { return $this->avsResultCode; }

00407     /**

00410      * Posible values are:
00411      * \li M = Match.
00412      * \li N = No match.
00413      * \li P = Not processed.

00420     
00421     /**
00422      * @brief Indicates the results of cardholder authentication verification.
00423      *
00424      * Posible values are:
00425      * \li null (or empty string) = CAVV not validated.
00426      * \li 0 = CAVV not validated because erroneous data was submitted.
00427      * \li 1 = CAVV failed validation.
00428      * \li 2 = CAVV passed validation.
00429      * \li 3 = CAVV validation could not be performed; issuer attempt incomplete.
00430      * \li 4 = CAVV validation could not be performed; issuer system error.
00431      * \li 5 = Reserved for future use.
00432      * \li 6 = Reserved for future use.
00433      * \li 7 = CAVV attempt - failed validation - issuer available (U.S.-issued card/non-U.S acquirer).
00434      * \li 8 = CAVV attempt - passed validation - issuer available (U.S.-issued card/non-U.S. acquirer).
00435      * \li 9 = CAVV attempt - failed validation - issuer unavailable (U.S.-issued card/non-U.S. acquirer).
00436      * \li A = CAVV attempt - passed validation - issuer unavailable (U.S.-issued card/non-U.S. acquirer).
00437      * \li B = CAVV passed validation, information only, no liability shift.
00438      * 
00439      * @return string The cardholder authentication verification value response code.
00440      */
00441     public function getCavvResponseCode() { return $this->cavvResponseCode; }
00442     
00443     /**
00444      * @brief Sets field value.
00445      * 
00446      * @param string $name The field name.
00447      * @param string $value The field value.
00448      * @return bool Returns TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise. 
00449      */
00450     public function setField($name, $value) {
00451         if (strstr($name, '|')) {
00452             trigger_error('Name can not contain the pipe character', E_USER_WARNING);
00453             return false;
00454         }
00455         
00456         if (is_array($value)) {
00457             // $value is array convert to string
00458             $value = serialize($value);
00459         }
00460         
00461         if (strstr($value, '|')) {
00462             trigger_error('Value can not contain the pipe character', E_USER_WARNING);
00463             return false;
00464         }
00465         
00466         $this->fields[$name] = $value;
00467         return true;
00468     }
00469     
00470     /**
00471      * @brief Returns the field value.
00472      * 
00473      * @param string $name The field name.
00474      * @return bool The field value if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00475      */
00476     public function getField($name) {
00477         if (array_key_exists($name, $this->fields)) {
00478             return $this->fields[$name];
00479         } else {
00480             return false;
00481         }
00482     }
00483     
00484     /**
00485      * @brief Returns fields in field-value pairs.
00486      * @returns string The fields in field-value pairs. 
00487      */
00488     public function getFieldsEncoded() {
00489         $tmp = '';
00490         foreach($this->fields as $key => $value) {
00491             $tmp .= "{$key}=" . urlencode($value) . '&';
00492         }
00493         $tmp = rtrim($tmp, '&');
00494         return $tmp;
00495     }
00496     
00497     /**
00498      * @brief Sends the request to Authorize.Net.
00499      * 
00500      * @return bool Returns TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00501      */
00502     public function send() {
00503         $ch = curl_init(); 
00504         
00505         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->url);
00506         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0); // set to 0 to eliminate header info from response
00507         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1); // returns response data instead of TRUE
00508         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $this->getFieldsEncoded());
00509         
00510         // uncomment the following line if you get no gateway response
00511         //curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, FALSE);
00512         
00513         $this->response = curl_exec($ch); //execute post and get results
00514         
00515         $error = curl_error($ch);
00516         if ($error) {
00517             trigger_error($error, E_USER_ERROR);
00518             return false;
00519         }
00520         
00521         curl_close ($ch);
00522         
00523         // parse response
00524         $responseFields = explode('|', $this->response);
00525         
00526         // strip quotes
00527         foreach ($responseFields as $key => $value) {
00528             $responseFields[$key] = substr($value, 1, strlen($value) - 2);
00529         }
00530         
00531         // set variables
00532         $this->responseCode = $responseFields[0];
00533         $this->responseSubcode = $responseFields[1];
00534         $this->responseReasonCode = $responseFields[2];
00535         $this->responseReasonText = $responseFields[3];
00536         $this->approvalCode = ($responseFields[4] == '000000') ? '' : $responseFields[4]; // replace 000000 with empty string
00537         $this->avsResultCode = $responseFields[5];
00538         $this->transactionId = $responseFields[6];
00539         $this->md5Hash = $responseFields[37];
00540         $this->cardCodeResponseCode = $responseFields[38];
00541         $this->cavvResponseCode = $responseFields[39];
00542         
00543         return true;
00544     }
00545     
00546     /**
00547      * @brief Loads values from \c $_POST.
00548      * 
00549      * @return int Returns number of values loaded, 0 if nothing was loaded.
00550      */
00551     public function loadPost() {
00552         $count = 0;
00553         if (!isset($_POST)) {
00554             trigger_error('Superglobal $_POST is not set', E_USER_WARNING);
00555         }
00556         
00557         foreach ($_POST as $key => $value) {
00558             $this->setField($key, $value);
00559             $count++;
00560         }
00561         return $count;
00562     }
00563     
00564     /**
00565      * @brief Sets the request to test mode.
00566      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00567      * @param bool $value[optional] Set to TRUE for test mode, FALSE for normal mode.
00568      */
00569     public function testRequest($value = true) {
00570         if ($value) {
00571             $this->setField('x_test_request', 'TRUE');
00572         } else {
00573             $this->setField('x_test_request', 'FALSE');
00574         }
00575         return true;
00576     }
00577     
00578     /**
00579      * @brief Returns HTML test form.
00580      * 
00581      * This function is usefully for generating a simple HTML form for testing 
00582      * Authorize.Net transactions. This form should only be used for testing purposes and is not secure.
00583      * 
00584      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00585      * @return Boo_Html_Form  The HTML form on success, FALSE otherwise.
00586      */
00587     public function htmlTestForm(array $attrs = array()) {
00588         $form = new Boo_Html_Form;
00589         $form->applyAttrs($attrs);
00590         
00591         $ol = new Boo_Html_Ul;
00592         
00593         foreach ($this->fields as $key => $value) {
00594             $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00595             $tmpLi->setContent("<label for\"{$key}\">{$key}</label><input type=\"text\" name=\"{$key}\" value=\"{$value}\"/>");
00596             $ol->addLi($tmpLi);
00597         }
00598         
00599         $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00600         $tmpLi->setContent('<input class="button button-submit" type="submit" value="Submit" /></li>');
00601         $ol->addLi($tmpLi);
00602         
00603         $form->setAttr('action', $this->url);
00604         $form->setContent($ol->html());
00605         return $form;
00606     }
00607     
00608     /**
00609      * @brief Gets the results as a HTML unordred list.
00610      * 
00611      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00612      * @param bool $debug[optional] Debug mode.
00613      * @return Boo_Html_Ul The results link as a HTML unordred list, FALSE on failure.
00614      * @warning This method will display sensitive information including everything sent to Authorize.Net. Be careful how you use it!
00615      */
00616     public function htmlResultsUl(array $attrs = array(), $debug = BOO_DEBUG) {
00617         if (BOO_PRODUCTION) {
00618             trigger_error('Function is not available in production mode, set BOO_PRODUCTION to false', E_USER_ERROR);
00619             return false;
00620         }
00621         
00622         $ul = new Boo_Html_Ul;
00623         $ul->applyAttrs($attrs);
00624         
00625         if ($this->getResponseCode() == 3 && $this->getResponseReasonCode() == 13) {
00626             trigger_error('Try Boo_AuthorizeNet::testRequest() in live mode', E_USER_WARNING);
00627             // do not return false
00628         }
00629         
00630         $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00631         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Transaction ID</b>: ' . $this->getTransactionId());
00632         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00633         
00634         $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00635         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Response Code</b>: ' . $this->getResponseCode() . " " . strtoupper($this->getResponseCodeWord()));
00636         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00637

00639         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Response Subcode</b>: ' . $this->getResponseSubcode());
00640         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00641

00643         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Response Reason Code</b>: ' . $this->getResponseReasonCode() . ' ' . $this->getResponseReasonText());
00644         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);

00647         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Approval Code</b>: ' . $this->getApprovalCode());
00648         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);

00652         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);

00656         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00657

00659         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Card Code Response Code</b>: ' . $this->getCardCodeResponseCode());
00660         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00661

00665         
00666         $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00667         $tmpLi->setContent('<b>Mode</b>: ' . strtoupper($this->getMode()) . ' ' . $this->getUrl());
00668         $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00669         
00670         if ($debug) {
00671             foreach ($this->fields as $key => $value) {
00672                 $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00673                 $tmpLi->setContent("<b>Field [{$key}]</b>: {$value}");
00674                 $ul->addLi($tmpLi);
00675             }
00676         }
00677         return $ul;
00678     }
00679 }
